A '''Water Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Water-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh |- | Squirtle || | Totodile || Mudkip || Piplup |- | Lapras || | Wooper || Feebas || Finneon |- | Staryu || | Marill || Clamperl || Buizel |- | Psyduck || | Qwilfish || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Cerulean City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Slateport City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Olivine City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Pastoria City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |} {{Eggs}}
